pages.text: The Cold Snap Stabber was built next to a player's mob farm. After days of watching players tear enemies down with their weapons, the Stabber stole one for themselves, and has been rampaging ever since.

pages.title: Nether Stabber
pages.text: A Stabber, melted from the heat of the Nether. No one knows how or why a horde of snowmen decided going to the Nether would be a good idea, but those that have leave behind a trail of slush when they move.

pages.title: End Stabber
pages.text: A Stabber, mutated by the desolate environments of the end. Has a chance to teleport you or itself when attacking or attacked

pages.title: Plague Stabber
pages.text: A Stabber filled with the murky waters of the swamp. May transmit parasites and diseases, or generally make you feel unwell
